channel.title: Big problem.. (continues to add to list :'( ) client.java:10656: non-static
channel.description:
This is an error with Compile.bat its set-up like:
[code]@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause[/code]
And this occures..:
[code]client.java:10656: non-static method killServer() cannot be referenced from a static context[/code] [hr] 2 questions: What in the hell does that mean :confused: And how do I make it go away Lol :o

item.title: Big problem.. (continues to add to list :'( ) client.java:10656: non-static
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

You’re trying to use a non static-method in the context as said, I’m no good at Java but don’t you need the class extension in the beginning? ClassName.KillServer() - Since you have it defined in a class you have to refer it to that class aye.

Read full topic
